comments:
Build ID: I20070209-1006

Steps To Reproduce:
1. go to debug perspective
2. click on java exception breakpoint in the toolbar of the breakpoint view
3. start typing in the search bar to search
4. while typing, can get an exception at random


More information:
It's probably a race condition, so doesn't happen all the time.  Here's the stack trace:

I did find bug 178795 when trying to reproduce this (which is a JDT bug), but I think this one is a problem with the FilteredItemsSelectionDialog. Moving to UI - this may already be fixed as the build ID is from Feb).
Bug has been fixed since I20070321-0010.
What is the bug number for the fix?

Proposition of changes

I can't reproduce this bug since I20070321-0010. Probably it depend on multi jobs which was fixed in I20070228-1000. Inside patch I change part of code which could be cause of problem
